Package controller

Interface IControllerMtoV

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface IControllerMtoV
Interface for the controller to communicate with the view. This interface defines methods that the controller can call to update the view.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkPaused()
    Checks if the simulation is paused.
    void
    clearLogArea()
    Clears the log area.
    void
    clearVisualisation()
    Clears the visualization.
    void
    setExternalViewButton()
    Sets the external view button.
    void
    showEndTime(double time)
    Shows the end time of the simulation.
    void
    showLogArea(String log)
    Shows the log area with the given log message.
    void
    showResults(String results)
    Shows the results of the simulation.
    void
    updateQueueLengths(List<List<Integer>> queueLengths)
    Updates the queue lengths in the visualization.
    void
    updateUIAfterReset()
    Updates the UI after the simulation is reset.
    void
    visualiseCustomer()
    Visualizes a new customer in the simulation.

      Shows the end time of the simulation.
      Parameters:

    • visualiseCustomer

      void visualiseCustomer()
      Visualizes a new customer in the simulation.

      Updates the queue lengths in the visualization.
      Parameters:
      queueLengths - the lengths of the queues

      void checkPaused()
      Checks if the simulation is paused.

      Shows the results of the simulation.

      void showLogArea(String log)
      Shows the log area with the given log message.
      Parameters:
      log - the log message

    • clearLogArea

      void clearLogArea()
      Clears the log area. This method is called by the controller to clear the log area.

    • clearVisualisation

      void clearVisualisation()
      Clears the visualization. This method is called by the controller to clear the visualization.

    • updateUIAfterReset

      void updateUIAfterReset()
      Updates the UI after the simulation is reset. This method is called by the controller to update the UI after the simulation is reset.

    • setExternalViewButton

      void setExternalViewButton()
      Sets the external view button. This method is called by the controller to set the external view button.
